title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.3 - Restrictions on licensing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.3 - Restrictions on licensing

State Regulations

No license shall be granted to any racing association
to conduct a race meeting within 100 miles of the track in the State of New

York of another racing association to be engaged at the same time in conducting
a race meeting, except in the case of an association which has conducted race
meetings continuously for at least 10 years preceding the first day of January, 1943. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
